document_data.name: knight's puissance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Knight's puissance''''' was a minor [[utterance]] from the Lexicon of the Evolving Mind that used [[truespeak]] to grant a target the ability to strike true in melee, or hamper it, if reversed.
document_data.Usage: In its straight form, it granted a tangible boost to the target's ability to strike true in melee. Its reversed form constantly pushed it off balance, hampering its efforts. Both lasted for roughly half a minute.
document_data.History: The utterance was known to [[loquasphinx]]es.{{cite book/Tome of Magic 3.5|269}}
